meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>song</kanji>'s <kanji>part of speech</kanji> is the part of the song where you're talking (aka singing). These are the word parts of the song. These are the <vocabulary>song lyrics</vocabulary>. Anyone ready for some カラオケ?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
